data.title: Discover Her Financial Success
data.meta_description: Curious about Ahna O'Reilly net worth 2024? Discover her financial journey and current wealth in this detailed guide by RachelParris. Visit rachelparris.com for more.
data.text:
Ever wondered what Ahna O’Reilly net worth is? You’re in the right place. In this comprehensive guide by RachelParris, we’ll explore the financial details of this talented actress.

From her early career to her most significant roles, we’ll see how she’s built her wealth over the years.

Quick Facts

FACTDETAILReal NameAhna O’ReillyPopular NameAhna O’ReillyGenderFemaleBirth DateSeptember 21, 1984Age39ParentsJames O’Reilly, Wenda O’ReillySiblingsN/ABirthplacePalo Alto, CaliforniaNationalityAmericanEthnicityCaucasianEducationUniversity of Southern California, Menlo SchoolMarital StatusN/ASexual OrientationN/AHusband/SpouseN/AChildrenN/ADatingDave AndronNet Worth$3 millionSource of WealthActingHeight5 ft 5 in

What is the Net Worth Of Ahna O’Reilly in 2024?

Ahna O’Reilly’s net worth in 2024 is estimated to be $3 million. This figure is quite impressive given her career span and notable roles.

When compared to other actresses in the same industry, such as Emma Stone, who has a net worth of $40 million, and Viola Davis, with $25 million, Ahna’s net worth reflects her steady success as a leading TV actress.

Her earnings primarily come from acting, with significant contributions from her roles in films like The Help and Fruitvale Station.

What is the Salary/Income of Ahna O’Reilly in 2024?

In 2024, Ahna’s annual salary is estimated to be around $500,000. This income includes her earnings from acting in films and TV shows, as well as endorsements and other projects.

Her consistent work in the entertainment industry and participation in various projects ensure a stable income, contributing significantly to her overall net worth.

Understanding Ahna O’Reilly’s Finances and Career

Major Roles and Acting Career

Ahna O’Reilly‘s acting career is marked by her prominent roles in films such as The Help, where she starred alongside Emma Stone and Viola Davis.

Her performance in Fruitvale Station further established her reputation as a talented actress. These key roles have not only boosted her fame but also contributed significantly to her earnings.

Earnings Breakdown by Projects

Ahna’s earnings come from a variety of sources. For her role in “The Help,” she earned a substantial salary, reflecting the film’s success.

Additionally, her work in TV shows has provided a steady income. Her earnings are not limited to acting alone; she has also made money through endorsements and other business ventures.

Investments and Business Ventures

Beyond acting, she has made smart investments in real estate, contributing to her net worth. While specific details of her business ventures are not publicly disclosed, it’s evident that her financial acumen extends beyond her on-screen performances, adding to her wealth.

Lifestyle and Personal Expenses

She leads a comfortable lifestyle, with her wealth allowing for various luxuries. She enjoys traveling and indulges in personal hobbies.

Moreover, she is known for her philanthropic efforts, donating to various charitable causes, which reflects her generous nature and financial stability.

FAQs about Ahna O’Reilly

Who is Ahna O’Reilly?

She is an American actress best known for her role as Elizabeth Leefolt in the film The Help. She’s recognized for her performances in both film and television.

When and where was Ahna born?

She was born on September 21, 1984, in Palo Alto, California.

How old is Ahna O’Reilly?

As of 2024, she is 39 years old.

What is Ahna’s educational background?

She graduated from Menlo School and attended the University of Southern California, where she earned a Bachelor’s degree.

What are some notable films Ahna has been in?

Apart from The Help, Ahna has appeared in Jobs, Fruitvale Station, and Where the Crawdads Sing.

What TV shows has Ahna appeared in?

She has made appearances in popular TV shows like CSI: NY, The Vampire Diaries, How I Met Your Mother, and The Morning Show.

Is Ahna involved in any philanthropic activities?

Yes, she is known for her philanthropy work and supports organizations like I Am That Girl and the Art of Elysium.

Has Ahna received any awards or recognitions?

Yes, she was part of the ensemble cast of The Help, which won several awards, and she was named one of Variety’s 10 Actors to Watch in 2012.

She dated actor James Franco from 2006 to 2011. She married writer and producer Dave Andron in 2020.

What is Ahna’s height and weight?

Ahna stands 5 feet 5 inches (1.65 meters) tall and weighs approximately 57 kg (126 lbs).

Conclusion

That’s the scoop on Ahna O’Reilly’s net worth. From acting to smart investments, she’s made impressive strides. For more insights and detailed articles on your favorite celebrities, visit rachelparris.com.
